snippet: A debate over what became of a list of nearly 2,000 Greeks with Swiss bank accounts is rapidly turning into a full-blown political crisis.
abstract: Memo from Athens; mystery of missing list of names of nearly 2,000 Greeks with Swiss bank accounts, part of ongoing corruption investigations, is rapidly turning into full-blown political crisis that is imperiling Greece's fragile coalition government.

byline.contributor: Dimitris Bounias and Niki Kitsantonis contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A debate over what became of a list of nearly 2,000 Greeks with Swiss bank accounts is rapidly turning into a full-blown political crisis.

headline.seo: Greek Government at Odds Over Missing List of Names
headline.main: Missing List of Names Widens Greek Political Fissure
headline.print_headline: Missing List of Names Widens Greek Political Fissure
